abstract: A lawsuit says ExxonMobil divided the state into 100 zones, and set different prices for the same grade of fuel in different zones.
snippet: A lawsuit says ExxonMobil divided the state into 100 zones, and set different prices for the same grade of fuel in different zones.
lead_paragraph: More than 100 New Jersey gas stations sued the Exxon Mobil Corporation on Wednesday, claiming they are being forced to overpay for wholesale gasoline and rent.

headline.main: New Jersey Gas Dealers Say Exxon Overcharges
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Gas Dealers Say Exxon Overcharges
